text: ariyuka: ninnal netiya yud'dhamutal entayalum atinre ancileann allahuvinum ‎avanre dutannum atutta bandhukkalkkum anathakalkkum agatikalkkum ‎valipeakkarkkummullatan; allahuvilum, irusanghannal parasparam errumuttiyatilute ‎satyasatyannal vyaktamayi vertilarinna nalil nam nam'mute dasann irakkikkeatuttatilum ‎visvasiccavaran ninnalenkil! allahu ella karyattinum kalivurravanatre. ‎
